mapper.insert: insert into tb_voucher_order (id, user_id, voucher_id, pay_type, status, create_time, pay_time, update_time) values (#{id} , #{userId} , #{voucherId}, #{payType}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{payTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select COUNT(1) from tb_voucher_order where user_id = #{id}
